## Code not run
You could obtain $\beta$ with R as a calculator

```{r eval = FALSE}
a <- (6-2)/2
l <- (6*a + 6)/6
g <- (14*l + 8*a - 9)/7
b <- 3*a - 4 + 2*g

print(b)

# spoiler: b should be 16
```
